SEARCH
Module flag4j
Package org.flag4j.linalg.ops.sparse.coo.field_ops

Class CooFieldMatrixProperties

java.lang.Object
org.flag4j.linalg.ops.sparse.coo.field_ops.CooFieldMatrixProperties
public final class CooFieldMatrixProperties extends Object
This class contains low level implementations for methods to evaluate certain properties of a sparse coo field matrix. For example, if the matrix is symmetric.

    • isIdentity

      public static <V extends Field<V>> boolean isIdentity(CooFieldMatrixBase<?,?,?,?,V> src)
      Checks if a complex sparse matrix is the identity matrix.
      Parameters:
      src - Matrix to check if it is the identity matrix.
      Returns:
      True if the src matrix is the identity matrix. Otherwise, returns false.
